content.rendered:
Creator Luciano Patrick

Directed by Ana Luiza Azevedo. Gisele Barroco. Joana Mariani

Written by Luciano Patrick. João Falcão. Fabio Montanari. Isabel Falcão

Cast Clarissa Müller( Luana4 episodes, 2022 ). Bruno Fagundes(unknown episodes ). Laila Garin(unknown episodes ). Filipe Bragança( Tadeuunknown episodes ). Marcelia Cartaxo(unknown episodes ). Lucy Alves( Deusaunknown episodes ). Jeniffer Nascimento(unknown episodes ). Agnes Nunes( Evaunknown episodes ). Gustavo Vaz(unknown episodes ). Adriano Viçoso(unknown episodes ). Micael(unknown episodes ). Giordano Castro(unknown episodes ). Leo Jaime(unknown episodes ). Solange Almeida(unknown episodes )

Language Portuguese

Producers Cristiane Miotto. Geórgia Costa Araújo. Luciano Patrick

Production Coração da Selva.

Official site Netflix

Season 1

Episodes 6
